video.title: Everyday Moments
video.synopsis: Sometimes it’s the little things in life that make the biggest difference. Join Elmo, Gordon, Telly, Big Bird and more as they learn everyday skills.

episodes.synopsis: Elmo wants to be just like Gordon so he has decided to spend the day looking and acting just like him.
episodes.title: Elmo Wants to Be Like Gordon

episodes.synopsis: Abby doesn't know how to ride a tricycle, so Elmo suggests that Gordon teaches Abby since he was the one who taught him.
episodes.title: Abby's Tricycle

episodes.synopsis: Telly’s new pogo stick, the iPogo, has an app for everything: but is pogoing still fun when the machine does all the work for you?
episodes.title: There's an App for That

episodes.synopsis: Telly and Elmo decide that they’re going to be on "noise patrol" in order to help keep it quiet during nap time for Leela's baby niece.
episodes.title: Don’t Wake the Baby

episodes.synopsis: At bedtime, Big Bird is excited to wear his new pajamas, but he can't sleep because there's something bothering him in his nest. What could it be?
episodes.title: What's in Big Bird's Nest

episodes.synopsis: Baby Bear is all dressed up to visit Granny when a chance encounter with Telly and a bright purple ice cream cone causes a laundry disaster.
episodes.title: Baby Bear Comes Clean (Next to Godliness)
